content.question: A monopolistically competitive firm’s demand curve will be least elastic if

choices.label: the number of rival firms producing very similar products increases
the number of rival firms producing more differentiated products increases
the number of rival firms producing very similar products decreases
the number of rival firms producing more differentiated products decreases
a monopolistically competitive firm’s demand curve becomes perfectly elastic

content.answer: the number of rival firms producing more differentiated products decreases

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
